feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA3/ERI1/LIM3][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 29, 21:00 UTC  -  Nov 30, 00:00 UTC

Nov 11, 00:14 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/11/2022 21:00 UTC
End time : 30/11/2022 00:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will be doing a maintenance operation on multiple network equipments.

entry.title: [BHS7][Network] - Reload network equipment
entry.content:
Nov 15, 08:31 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 15, 08:25 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/11/2022 08:30 UTC
End time : 15/11/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : The Vrack network will be unavailable while the network equipment is being reloaded (around 10min).
Service improvement : Our network team needs to perform a reload of a network device to fix a bug.
